member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SessionOptions.IdleTimeout
member.summary: The IdleTimeout indicates how long the session can be idle before its contents are abandoned. Each session access resets the timeout. Note this only applies to the content of the session, not the cookie.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SessionOptions.IOTimeout
member.summary: The maximum amount of time allowed to load a session from the store or to commit it back to the store. Note this may only apply to asynchronous operations. This timeout can be disabled using .
